title: PSProject Status Schema
description: Schema for the PSProjectStatus configuration file.

Name.description: Specify the project name. In PowerShell, this will typically be the module name.

Path.description: Specify the project path. It should be the directory containing this file.

LastUpdate.description: Specify the last update time of the project. This value will be formatted by ConvertTo-JSON.

ProjectVersion.description: Specify the project version. You might use the PowerShell module version.

Computername.description: Specify the computer name where this project was last updated.

Author.description: Specify the project author. It could be the module author.

UpdateUser.description: Specify the user who updated the project.

GitBranch.description: Specify the git branch of the project.

Comment.description: Add additional comments about the project.

Tasks.description: Specify a list of pending tasks for the project.

RemoteRepository.description: Enter information about remote git repositories.

Name.description: Specify the name of the remote repository.

Url.description: Specify the url of the remote repository.

Mode.description: Specify the git mode for the remote branch.
